TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListViewSortEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当单击排序按钮时，但在 控件处理排序操作之前，控件引发事件。The control raises the event when a Sort button is clicked, but before the control handles the sort operation. (排序按钮是 `CommandName` 属性设置为 "Sort" 的按钮。 ) 这使您能够提供一个事件处理方法，该方法可在每次发生此事件时执行自定义例程，如自定义排序表达式。(A Sort button is a button whose `CommandName` property set to "Sort".) This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as customizing the sort expression. 对象传递到事件处理方法。A object is passed to the event-handling method. 此对象可用于指定或确定控件的排序表达式和排序方向 。This object enables you to specify or determine the sort expression and sort direction for the control. 若要确定排序表达式，请使用 属性。To determine the sort expression, use the property. 若要确定排序方向，请使用 属性。To determine the sort direction, use the property. 还可以通过将属性设置为来取消排序操作 `true` 。You can also cancel a sorting operation by setting the property to `true`. 有关 类的实例的初始属性值列表，请参见 构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of the class, see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 对象显示排序方向和正在排序的列。The following example shows how to use the object to display the sort direction and the column that is being sorted. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorting#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorting/CS/ListViewSortingCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorting#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorting/VB/ListViewSortingVB.aspx#1)]

related.span: 技术概述： ListView 控件

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数初始化类的新实例 。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. > [!NOTE] > 此构造函数主要由控件开发人员在引发事件时使用。This constructor is primarily used by control developers when they raise events. 下表显示 类的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of the class. |propertiesProperty|初始值Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`sortExpression` 参数的值。The value of the `sortExpression` parameter.| ||`sortDirection` 参数的值。The value of the `sortDirection` parameter.|

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件的排序方向。

span.span: Gets or sets the direction in which to sort the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，可以使用 属性来指定或确定 控件排序项的顺序。When the event is raised, you can use the property to specify or determine the order in which the control will sort items. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 对象显示排序方向以及要排序的列。The following example shows how to use the object to display the sort direction and the column being sorted. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorting#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorting/CS/ListViewSortingCS.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorting#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorting/VB/ListViewSortingVB.aspx#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置用于对 控件中的项进行排序的表达式。

span.span: Gets or sets the expression that is used to sort the items in the control.

value.span: 用于对 控件中的项进行排序的表达式。

span.span: The expression that is used to sort the items in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，可以使用 属性来指定将用于对控件进行排序的排序表达式 。When the event is raised, you can use the property to specify the sort expression that will be used to sort the control. 排序表达式包含要排序的字段的名称。The sort expression contains the name of the field to sort. 您还可以通过编程方式将该属性设置为以逗号分隔的字段名称列表，来一次对多个列进行排序。You can also sort multiple columns at a time by programmatically setting this property to a comma-separated list of field names. > [!NOTE] > 默认情况下，该 控件将排序方向应用于完整的列列表。By default, the control applies the sort direction to the complete list of columns. 因此，排序方向仅适用于列表中的最后一列。As a result, the sort direction applies to only the last column in the list. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 对象显示排序方向以及要排序的列。The following example shows how to use the object to display the sort direction and the column being sorted. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorting#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorting/CS/ListViewSortingCS.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorting#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorting/VB/ListViewSortingVB.aspx#2)] 下面的示例演示如何设置 属性，以便对每个列应用不同排序方向的多个列进行排序。The following example shows how to set the property in order to sort multiple columns with different sort directions applied to each column. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewSortEventArgs.SortExpression#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewSortEventArgs.SortExpression/CS/SortExpressionCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewSortEventArgs.SortExpression#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewSortEventArgs.SortExpression/VB/SortExpressionVB.aspx#1)]
